title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the harsh criticism Aaron Rodgers received over the past few days and why we shouldn't be surprised by this at all. He believes the Browns are the one team right now who should be contending for a Super Bowl. He shares the one team that makes the most sense for Odell Beckham Jr. to sign with for the remainder of the season. Plus, Fox Sports College Football Analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to give his plan for expanding the college football playoff format. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
